questions.question_text: Do you agree with this statement? * (if the answer is, it depends, respond with your most common or most likely answer)
Why did you answer the way you did about yourself? *
Do you think most other people would agree with this statement? * (if the answer is, it depends, respond with your most common or most likely answer)
Why did you answer the way you did about most other people? *

answers.option: I think most people have good judgment with regard to this topic
answers.value: I think most people have good judgment with regard to this topic

answers.option: I think most people lack good judgment with regard to this topic
answers.value: I think most people lack good judgment with regard to this topic

answers.option: I think it's mostly a matter of opinion
answers.value: I think it's mostly a matter of opinion

questions.question_text: Overall, do you think this statement is an example of common sense?
